synopsis.text: Chiko is an eleven-year-old girl who has suffered loneliness and misfortune. After losing her parents, she is sent to live with her aunt and uncle, who secretly plot to inherit the Mikamo family's wealth by poisoning Chiko. Her life changes dramatically when she is kidnapped by the legendary phantom thief known as "Nijuu Mensou" (Twenty Faces). Finding friendship and freedom with Twenty Faces' band of thieves, Chiko embarks on thrilling adventures across exotic lands in search of treasure. She gradually transforms as she discovers her own strength amidst strange events circling the mystery of Twenty Faces' legacy. Despite the unpredictable course her life takes, Chiko perseveres in moving forward. With Twenty Faces as her mentor, she learns to thrive through both adversity and excitement.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
